name: Cyber Revolt (grapefruits)
description:
Set in a futuristic world ruled by Scorion, play as a descendant of the knight Lancelot a former seat holder at the round table, who uses his ancestral ties to fight his way through the hordes to halt the corruption Scorion is spreading throughout the world. While also getting as many points as you can on the way.

Our game is basically :

  • - A 2D “Run n Gun” platformer heavily inspired by classics such as Konami’s “Contra” and SNK’s “Metal Slug.”
  • - Thematically and aesthetically inspired by films such as Blade Runner and Ghost in the Shell.
  • - Medieval weapons with a modern twist.
  • - Fast Paced, Action packed.
